hero.title: Creation of digital experiences from A to Z
hero.subtitle: A development brand specializing in web solutions and digital transformations with a human approach.

clients.title: We have worked with exceptional clients

projects.title: Our latest projects
projects.description: Discover our latest projects carried out for our clients

hero.title: Who am I?
hero.description: I'm a full-stack web developer passionate about building websites and web applications. I have extensive experience in front-end and back-end development, as well as web design. My goal is to help you bring your ideas to life online.
hero.experience_description: I have been a developer by passion for over 10 years, and since 2022, I have been creating websites and web applications for my clients.
hero.projects_description: I have completed numerous projects, ranging from simple showcase sites to large-scale applications and online stores.
hero.clients_description: I am proud to have helped my clients achieve their goals, and I hope to support them as best I can in their future projects.

about.title: About
about.description: I'm a passionate full-stack developer. I started when I was 8 years old, writing my first lines of code in Java, creating Minecraft mods. I then moved on to web development and now work with the latest technologies, such as Svelte, Bun, and TypeScript. In the future, I want to create applications for everyone that simplify life.

education.title: Training
education.description: I hold a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Mathematics, and I am currently studying Multimedia and Internet at the University of Mulhouse, where I am learning web development, communication, 3D, video, and audio. I am in my second year and am currently specializing in web development.

hero.title: Contact
hero.subtitle: Do you have a project in mind? I'm here to listen and advise you, free of charge!

get_in_touch.title: Let's get in touch
get_in_touch.description: Feel free to contact me through my social media or by email. I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations.

availability.title: Availability
availability.description: I am available for freelance projects and collaborations. I usually respond within 24 hours.

looking_for_work.title: Are you looking for a developer?
looking_for_work.description: I'm always interested in new opportunities. Let me know if you think I can help!

olwe.title: OLWE Development
olwe.description: Fullstack developer, mainly on web applications using React with Next for the front-end and Express with MariaDB on the back-end.

kesval.title: KesvaL Studio
kesval.description: I work with my partner as a fullstack web developer, on sites using CMS or on web applications using modern technologies.

ciotadin_office.title: The Ciotaden Office
ciotadin_office.description: Assistant and receptionist in a general purpose computer repair shop.

uha.title: University of Upper Alsace
uha.description: I am a computer science student at the University of Haute-Alsace, where I am acquiring skills in web and mobile development, as well as project management in BUT MMI.

theodore_deck.title: Théodore Deck High School
theodore_deck.description: I obtained my baccalaureate with honors in math and computer science at Lycée Théodore Deck in Guebwiller.

cta.title: Do you have a project in mind?

secondary.title: Do you have a question?
secondary.description: I am here to listen to you and advise you, free of charge!
